Author: sharpshoot
Title: Joyent Slingshot: Allows you to port rails applications which converge between the web and the desktop

Author: veritas
Content: I looked at their site (Slingshot) and although the framework seems interesting, there's a catch.  To use it free you have to host on their "Joyent Accelerators."  Bah... no thanks.  I'll just Apollo or XUL.
